objects.text:
• Unmatched UV400 Protection
• Premium Acetate Frame
• Ultimate Comfort for All Day Wear

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style Meets Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with iconic design
• Classic black frame made from high-quality acetate material
• Dark tinted lenses offering 100% UV protection
• Signature Ray-Ban logo on lens and temple
• Durable and lightweight construction for all-day comfort
• Versatile wayfarer style suitable for all face shapes
• Impact-resistant lenses for enhanced durability
• Premium hinges for long-lasting performance
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• Unisex design perfect for any occasion

banner_details:
This promotional banner is split vertically into two equal sections. The left half consists of all textual content and call-to-action elements, while the right half predominantly features a product image of sunglasses. The top-left section displays a bold two-line brand and product name (ID: `heading`) in large white font. Below it is a tagline (ID: `tagline`) in red, providing a sleek contrast and drawing attention. A feature list (ID: `description`) highlights product advantages with bullet points. Price information (ID: `price`) stands out in bold white over a dark background. A red call-to-action button (ID: `cta_button`) with white uppercase text (ID: `cta`) encourages immediate engagement. At the bottom left, a subheading (ID: `subheading`) and additional product details (ID: `additional_info`) are neatly aligned. The right half has a realistic image of the product (ID: `product_image`) with subtle directional graphics in white. The background uses a dark linear gradient with soft stylistic accents.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#252525`
- Charcoal Gray: `#454545`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Red: `#FF0000`
- Gradient Accent Red: `#BB0000` to `#FF0000`
- Divider Gray: `#555555`
product_color: The product image showcases a classic, high-contrast look with a predominantly black color palette. The glossy black frame (#000000) dominates the design, exuding sophistication and elegance. The dark tinted lenses are a rich charcoal gray (#2C2C2C), subtly distinguishing themselves from the frame. The white Ray-Ban logo (#FFFFFF) is sharply contrasted and acts as a focal point, enhancing brand recognition. Minimal metallic accents (#C0C0C0) on the hinges add a sleek, modern touch. These colors are smoothly blended across the frame's curves, with light reflections highlighting contours and finishes. A banner design can effectively use this monochromatic palette, emphasizing luxury and timeless style.
